original_text: There, at Riblah in the Hamath region, the king of Babylon commanded his soldiers to punish them all with death.
korean_text: 바벨론의 왕이 하맛 땅 립나에서 다 쳐 죽였더라 이와 같이 유다가 사로잡혀 본국에서 떠났더라

sentences.original_text: There, at Riblah in the Hamath region
the king of Babylon commanded his soldiers
to punish them all with death
